materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the General Hospital in Rangoon, Burma. The hospital building is a long building, with three extended sections. There is a tower behind the hospital in the background of the photograph. There is a horse-drawn carriage in front of the hospital. The photograph is folded at the top right and left corners. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java General Hospital, Rangoon
